I am 5'3" and 240 lbs. I ordered the black XXL. I pulled this out of the package and was unsure of item. I could see right through it. I figured I could just wear a black cami underneath if it fits and I like it. I was hesitant about that too. It's thin (obviously). Do not buy this if you are looking to keep you warm. I'm going to save it for spring.  It does fit. The sleeves go all the way down to my wrists. It's not tight or loose. The only thing that is kind of annoying is where the stripes are, you can feel them on your arms. However I can mentally block it out after awhile.  I will keep it, but I wouldn't buy another-only because I wasn't expecting something so thin. Just trying to find a normal sweatshirt.
